I   Typography

Special characters : % & \ ^ _ $ # © ® ™

Typography neutral: sep… sep…sep
«inside» sep « inside » sep « inside » sep
sep `inside' sep ` inside ' sep “inside” sep “ inside ” sep
sep! sep: sep; sep? sep!? sep, sep
sep ! sep : sep ; sep ? sep !? sep, sep
sep ! sep : sep ; sep ? sep !? sep, sep
sep ! sep : sep ; sep ? sep !? sep, sep

Typography english: sep… sep…sep
«inside» sep « inside » sep « inside » sep
sep ‘inside’ sep ‘ inside ’ sep “inside” sep “ inside ” sep
sep! sep: sep; sep? sep!? sep, sep
sep ! sep : sep ; sep ? sep !? sep, sep
sep ! sep : sep ; sep ? sep !? sep, sep
sep ! sep : sep ; sep ? sep !? sep, sep

Typography french : sep… sep…sep
« inside » sep « inside » sep « inside » sep
sep ‘inside’ sep ‘ inside ’ sep “inside” sep “ inside ” sep
sep ! sep : sep ; sep ? sep !? sep, sep
sep ! sep : sep ; sep ? sep !? sep, sep
sep ! sep : sep ; sep ? sep !? sep, sep
sep ! sep : sep ; sep ? sep !? sep, sep

B)   Abbreviations

$ier Le 1er élément.

$iere La 1re chose.

$ieme Le 3e élément.

$no Le no7 est ici.

$No no7

C)   Text formatting

$fmt.bold one two three

$fmt.italic one two three

$fmt.sansserif one two three

$fmt.script one two three

$fmt.smallcaps one two three

$fmt.strikeout one two three

$fmt.typewriter one two three

$fmt.subscript one two three

$fmt.superscript one two three Mme Durand

$fmt.typewriter one two three

$fmt.underline one two three

$fmt.size.p1 one two three

$fmt.size.p2 one two three

$fmt.size.p3 one two three

$fmt.size.p4 one two three

$number

Typography neutral: sep 12 sep -12.3 sep 1234567.8901 sep -1234567.8901 sep 1234567,8901 sep +1234567,8901

Typography english: sep 12 sep –12.3 sep 1,234,567.890,1 sep –1,234,567.890,1 sep 1,234,567,890,1 sep +1,234,567,890,1

Typography french : sep 12 sep –12.3 sep 1 234 567.890 1 sep –1 234 567.890 1 sep 1 234 567,890 1 sep +1 234 567,890 1

F)   Lists

    2. One Two
      1. One Two One
      2. One Two Two

G)   Links

$hyperlink hyperlink caption

Links to the target above.

$footnotes.add Before [1] after.

1.   Header level 3

$footnotes.add Foonote two [2]

2.   Header level 3 again

$footnotes.add Foonote three [3]

[1] Footnote contents.

[2] Foonote two contents.

[3] Foonote three contents.

H)   Footnotes flushing

Footnotes flushed after header level 2.

$footnotes.add Footnote four [1] restarts from 1.

$footnotes.flush Before

[1] Footnote four contents.

After

$footnotes.add Footnote five [1]

[1] Footnote five contents.
